## Before or during your master's thesis

### NAWI - Leistungsstipendium

Stipend of the Natural Science Faculty (we have mixed experiences with it)

<https://nawi.uni-graz.at/de/studieren/informationen-und-formulare-fuer-studierende/stipendien/leistungsstipendium/#c125989>

### NAWI - Förderstipendium

Stipend of the Natural Science Faculty

<https://nawi.uni-graz.at/de/studieren/informationen-und-formulare-fuer-studierende/stipendien/foerderungsstipendium/>

### Grazer Universitaetsverbund

No experience so far

<https://universitaetsbund.uni-graz.at/de/gub-foerderungen/>

### BioTechMed-Graz lab rotation program

This is suitable if you would like to go to another lab and learn a new method to potentially check out PhD options elswhere

<https://biotechmedgraz.at/de/programme/lab-rotation-program/>

## If you would like to apply for a PhD stipend after finishing your Master's thesis

There is a possibility to apply to the Austrian Academy of Sciences, but it has to be done well in advance:

<https://stipendien.oeaw.ac.at/stipendien/doc>

## After finishing the thesis

### Initiative Gehirnforschung Steiermark

IngeSt Prise in the category "Masterarbeit/Diplom"

<https://gehirnforschung.at/nachwuchsforderung/forschungspreis/>

### Prises of the Austrian Society for Neurpsychology (Gesellschaft für Neuropsychologie Österreich)

Advertised x1 per year via Email, look out for an email from Natalia

<https://gnpoe.at/>
